body_content.explanation: the act of pressing something into a smaller space or putting pressure on it from different sides until it gets smaller:
examples: Tectonic forces caused compression in the earth’s crust.
Compression fractures of the spine are common in older people.

body_content.explanation: the act of making something smaller or shorter so that it will fit into a particular space or time
the act of making a computer file use less space when it is stored, using special software:
examples: Advances in compression technology mean that you can now send even quite large files by email.
